name: Grunk Ironhide
short_description: a half-ogre weapon and armor smith
long_description: The shop keeper is an enormous half-ogre smith wearing heavy leather apron. He has coarse black hair, and a black beard and moustache. His facial features betray great strength and self assurance.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome! Need a weapon or armor?
dialogue.default: I craft both fine weapons and sturdy armor. My work is some of the best you'll find.
dialogue.goodbye: May your gear serve you well!
